mean_en: ideas, statements or beliefs that you think are ridiculous or not true; spoken or written words that have no meaning or make no sense; silly or unacceptable behaviour
sentence: The girl thought the boy was talking nonsense.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩觉得男孩在说废话。
word_etyma: non无 + sense感觉，意义 → nonsense无意义
